snippet: BREIDENBACH--Lester "Mickey," passed away June 15, 2016. Survived by loving wife, Carolyn; daughter Lynn Phillips, (Rick), stepson Robert Klineman, and three grandsons. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BREIDENBACH--Lester "Mickey," passed away June 15, 2016. Survived by loving wife, Carolyn; daughter Lynn Phillips, (Rick), stepson Robert Klineman, and three grandsons. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BREIDENBACH, LESTER "MICKEY," PASSED AWAY JUNE 15
